product_name: Louis Garneau Perfo Light Power Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A 12-panel design means the men's Perfo Light Power Bike Shorts from Louis Garneau give you amazing fit and support. Lightweight shorts feature a highly breathable, perforated memory foam chamois for road or mountain biking. Flatlock seams reduce chafing; elastic waist has a drawstring to secure the fit. Compressive leg cuffs lower leg pressure, provide support and won't restrict circulation. Gel pocket on thigh. Louis Garneau Perfo Light Power Bike Shorts for men have back and bottom reflective accents. Closeout.
short_description: A 12-panel design means the men's Perfo Light Power Bike Shorts from Louis Garneau give you amazing fit and support.
